transcript: I want you to act like he's coming back. Both of you. Don't think I haven't noticed you since he invited her here. I won't stand for any nonsense.

segments.text: I want you to act like he's coming back. Both of you. Don't think I haven't noticed you since he invited her here.
I won't stand for any nonsense.
